comment_text: Man, you are a NATURAL teacher. I regret not having many dudes like you in my learning time, maybe I'd be smarter :). I'm catching up now tho!
can you make a video on how to graph an antiderivative;  from the graph of the derivative ?
What program are you using to draw the lines?

For those who don't really understand...Imagine like
a, the first part is -x^2, so dy/dx=-2x
b, the second part, y=2x so dy/dx=2
c, the third part, same thing
d, the last part, y=-2x so dy/dx= -2

Hello Khan, 
I was wondering if you have any videos on how to sketch the graph of an antiderivative of a function f. Thank you!
